title: 109_s1039
content: Gas Price Reduction Through Increased Refinery Capacity Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers to elect to expense the cost of qualified refinery property placed in service before January 1, 2012, or under a binding construction contract before January 1, 2008. Requires that such refinery meet specified production levels and comply with all applicable environmental laws Classifies petroleum refining property as five-year property for depreciation purposes.
